Name: Coco Naut
Ingredients: 45 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.
Review: This snow-white drink is hardly innocent with a double shot of overproof rum masked by the sweet coconut.
Nutrition: One serving of Coco Naut contains 230 calories
